/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a serene street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and continuity. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
